title: What is fitness exercise?
brief_description: Uses a combination of animation and live-action to illustrate the benefits of physical fitness. A good sorceress teaches a scrawny knight the value being fit on general health and knightly pursuits. As he travels the kingdom he learns the elements of physical fitness, the correct way to exercise, the need to develop personal fitness levels and how being fit relates to health, work, sport and regular routines.
